translation.childrenSubLab0: Rackmount servers | Tower servers | Power Edge Servers | Stocking Harbor
translation.QualityText: FD GROUP is an IT material sales company that offers solutions tailored to your needs and guarantees the quality of your infrastructure with our products and our before and after sales services in an effective and efficient way.
translation.Abaut1: Founded with a clear vision to deliver a perfect customer experience, FD GROUP is a trusted provider of new & refurbished IT equipment for business IT maintenance and optimization. FD GROUP is an IT broker that provides you the infrastructure which your IT park needs
translation.About2: FD Group operates in all that is service provision, IT equipment supply and telephony call center.We offer a wide variety of multi-brand equipment such as: routers, inverters, switches, videoconferencing and audiovisual solutions, servers, microsoft solutions, telephony among others.We provide from spare part to complete configuration
translation.About3: FD GROUP's mission is to offer you solutions adapted to your needs, provide you and ensure the quality of your infrastructure with our products and services before and after sales, assist you effectively and efficiently, deliver quickly and build your loyalty
translation.Text1: FD GROUP helps African companies meet their demands and expectations for scalable and cost-effective IT infrastructure. Today, we serve customers in more than 30 countries and offer a wide range of storage, conferencing, network hardware, telephony equipment from leading manufacturers such as
translation.TextIn: IBM, APC, HP, LOGITECH, CISCO, TP-LINK and more
translation.Text2: At FD GROUP, we seek – and respect – the quality of the products we market and believe that excellent customer service is at the heart of the shopping experience
translation.Text4: Through our carrier and freight forwarding partners, we offer you a variety of shipping options depending on your needs
translation.prodCard1: We have worked with our customers in 30 countries across Africa, selling IT equipment and providing technical support.
translation.description1: Servers of file storage in general and Structured for in databases.
translation.description2: Our stock contains very sophisticated networking devices.
translation.description3: Find the CPU  and other components parts.
translation.description4: Find your best audiovisuel and conferencing equipment.
translation.swip2: Take a look of our products
translation.Testm0: Witnesses who work with us and who have given their opinions of our services.
translation.Testm1: I have been purchasing FD Group services for a long time, I really like the performance, my products arrive on time. I recommend FD Group to anyone who wants to acquire IT equipment for their company.

translation.CarousSubTitle1: Get your team motivated with high-quality equipment
translation.CarousSubTitle2: Opt for the quality of our products
translation.CarousText0: Our expertise in IT and project management makes us the best at helping to you achieve your goals.
translation.CarousText1: We sell high performance products that can create a more dynamic environment in your company
translation.CarousText2: The quality of the products consists of our trademarks.
translation.TextProd0: Find our server models here. We present you the following models: Rackmount servers, Server’s towers, Servers Power Edge and Storage. Click the button below to find out
translation.TextProd1: Find our Network Devices models here. We present you the following models: Switchs, Routers, IP Phones and SFP. Click the button below to find out.
translation.TextProd2: Find our network device models here. We present you the following models: Drives, RAM, Battery, Motherboards and CPU. Click the button below to find out.
translation.TextProd3: Find our audiovisual and conference products in different models from the following brands: Logitech, Cisco, Jabra, Polycom, Ibm, HP, Dell...

translation.Contactdescription: Your message has been sent successfully.
translation.ServiText0: The FD Group operates in everything that is service provision, supply of equipment and telephony call center. We offer a wide variety of multi-brand equipment.
translation.ServiText1: We satisfy the demand such as IT materials from a reliable supplier for the user or consumer. We sell equipment from one supplier to one location with the aim of facilitating the process of building your company.
translation.ServiText2: We gave full support and attention to the customer, in case of installation of the material purchased in our company.
translation.ServiText3: The computer maintenance technician ensures the maintenance and repair of computer equipment. We can also install new equipment or train users.
translation.ServiText4: Our customer support team is made up of qualified and capable people, working 24h/7j to provide support when our customers have problems with our company's products or services and to ensure that issue is solved.
translation.ServiText5: We offer a wide variety of multi-brand equipment such as: routers, inverters, switches, videoconferencing and audiovisual solutions, servers, microsoft solutions, telephony, among others. We even provide the complete setup.
